@graph.name: Carrot Celery Leek Potato Soup. Vegan, glutenfree - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Carrot Celery Leek Potato Soup. A delicious, comforting and healthy soup that's ready in no time. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.

itemListElement.name: Carrot Celery Leek Potato Soup. Vegan, glutenfree

@graph.name: Carrot Celery Leek Potato Soup. Vegan Gluten Free
@graph.description: Carrot Celery Leek Potato Soup. A delicious, comforting and healthy soup that's ready in no time. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon organic canola oil or coconut oil
1/2 teaspoon Cajun spice or spice blend of choice
1 teaspoon raw sugar or agave syrup

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add a teaspoon organic canola oil or coconut oil, Add 3 cloves of garlic chopped, chili flakes and cook for a minute on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add a teaspoon organic canola oil or coconut oil, Add 3 cloves of garlic chopped, chili flakes and cook for a minute on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the leek and cook for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the leek and cook for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped carrots, celery and potato.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chopped carrots, celery and potato.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cumin powder and  Cajun spice or spice blend of choice and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cumin powder and  Cajun spice or spice blend of choice and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the water, salt, raw sugar or agave syrup and Cook covered on low heat for 10 minutes, stirring 1-2 times in between.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the water, salt, raw sugar or agave syrup and Cook covered on low heat for 10 minutes, stirring 1-2 times in between.

recipeInstructions.text: Take off heat and cool for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Take off heat and cool for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend this into a smooth puree and pour into the same pan. Add more water to get desired consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend this into a smooth puree and pour into the same pan. Add more water to get desired consistency.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on medium heat in the pan till it comes to a boil. Adjust salt and spice..
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on medium heat in the pan till it comes to a boil. Adjust salt and spice..

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with thinly chopped carrot, celery and/or leek
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with thinly chopped carrot, celery and/or leek
